markdownRemark.excerpt: In commit message just add following text as format # followed by fix, close
markdownRemark.html:
In commit message just add following text as format # followed by fix, close

  • fix #xxx
  • fixes #xxx
  • fixed #xxx
  • close #xxx
  • closes #xxx
  • closed #xxx
  • resolve #xxx
  • resolves #xxx
  • resolved #xxx

frontmatter.title: How to automatically close github issue
frontmatter.description: How to close github issue by commit message
